title: Add content file diffing (SKILL.md, MEMO.md, references/) with prompts
Test sync with ai-talking-heads from sandbox to source
Create sync-skill-back.sh with FEEDBACK.jsonl and CONFIG.yaml handling
Update AGENTS.md script table with sync-skill-back.sh
De-dupe sandbox paths with SANDBOX_ROOT variable
description: SEED_FILE and SANDBOX_SKILLS_DIR both derive from ~/Development/sandbox/. Extract SANDBOX_ROOT variable to reduce duplication and make the sandbox location configurable.
close_reason: Added SANDBOX_ROOT env var, moved seeds to skillmonger/seeds/, simplified sandbox path to $SANDBOX_ROOT/skills

title: Add 'skill status' command for workflow resumption
description: Create ~/.skillmonger-state file and 'skill status' command. develop-skill.sh writes state after scaffold, ship-skill.sh clears after ship. Running 'skill status' from anywhere shows: current skill, last action, next step with copy-paste command. Helps forgetful users resume work.
close_reason: Added scripts/skill command with status/clear subcommands. develop-skill.sh writes state, ship-skill.sh clears it.

title: develop-skill workflow doesn't populate   CONFIG.yaml
description: The develop-skill workflow creates new skills but leaves CONFIG.yaml with only minimal   compaction fields. It should populate the full structure including skill metadata, triggers, dependencies,   loading, and budget sections.
close_reason: Fixed: develop-skill.sh now scaffolds CONFIG.yaml with placeholder triggers
